snippet: Three second half goals gave a confident-looking Japan a 3-1 victory over Costa Rica in a friendly ahead of the World Cup at the Raymond James stadium in Tampa, Florida on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Japan Shine in Confident Win Over Costa Rica
headline.main: Japan Shine in Confident Win Over Costa Rica

lead_paragraph: Three second half goals gave a confident-looking Japan a 3-1 victory over Costa Rica in a friendly ahead of the World Cup at the Raymond James stadium in Tampa, Florida on Monday.
